page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart mapped data group object
page.description: The mapping of raw data into a group.

property.name: index
property.description: The index of the group in the parent groups array.

property.name: dimensions
property.description: An array of the dimensions of the mapped data in the context of the group. See *[link:A5.chart Mapped Dimension Object]*.

property.name: points
property.description: The data points in the group. Missing points will be null. See *[link:A5.chart Mapped Data Point Object]*.
